Title: Provides for the licensing of apartment information vendors; defines such vendors as people who, for a fee, provide information on available apartments; repealer
Summary: Provides for the licensing of apartment information vendors; defines such vendors as persons who, for a fee, furnish information concerning the location and availability of rental real property.
LawCode: Rpld Art 12-C, amd ยง440, RP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to apartment information vendors; and to repeal article 12-C of such law relating thereto
